thread.section_title: City Finance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of City Finance | cityfinance.com.au | 3 of 4
thread.title: Ken

author: Ken
title: Ken
text:
I would highly recommend City Finance to people from all walks of life ! They are customer focused , not pushy like cash converters , the have decent realistic interest rates ( Not inflated and no hidden costs !) they don't threaten people if you had / have a problem ! They have friendly staff that can tailor your loan to suit your needs ! I have told family and friends to give City Finance a try they'll be glad they did !
Top marks to them . Finally a company for the people . I hope that City Finance will be around for centuries .
